bibl.title: William H. Geary and William Williams v. United States of America. Petition + Order for Writ of Habeas Corpus
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

org.orgName: District Court for the third Judicial District of Washington Territory

body.p: In the District Courts of the 3rd Judicial District holding terms at Port Townsend W.T.
In the matter of the petitioners of William H. Geary and William Williams for a writ of Habeas Corpus

Upon reading this petition herein filed I am satisfied that the cause of Justice would be promoted by the allowance of the writ and the granting to petitoners a hearing on the same- and it is hereby ordered that the clerk of our said court issue a Writ of Habeas Corpus returnable before me at Port Townsend on Monday the 12th day of May A.D. 1873 at ten o'clock A.M.
Dated at chambers in the city of Seattle W.T. this the 7th day of May AD 1873
Petition + Order for Writ of Habeas Corpus
U.S. vs William H. Geary + William Williams
#754 William H Garey and William William
